name: King Machine
description: King Machine is a game about building machines. Explore an abandoned factory, finding useful machinery and gradually building the tools and structures you need to restore the factory to operation. What was the original purpose of the factory and why was it shut down?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 2x 2GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 6600+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
